item.title: BayWa 在更广泛的重组前获得 5.47 亿欧元的生命线
item.description: 总部位于慕尼黑的 BayWa 股份公司已从其股东和贷款银行筹集到 5.47 亿欧元（约合 6.02 亿美元）的额外流动资金，使这家资金紧张的德国大宗商品贸易商有更多时间组织更广泛的重组。【原文：Munich-based BayWa AG has raised €547 million ($602 million) in additional liquidity from its shareholders and lender banks, giving the cash-strapped German commodities trader more time to organize a broader restructuring.】

item.title: 文件显示，Effissimo 在日本市场动荡之际买入股票
item.description: Effissimo Capital Management Pte 利用上周日本市场的历史性崩溃，增持了 UACJ Corp. 和 Sanken Electric Co.【原文：Effissimo Capital Management Pte took advantage of last week’s historic market meltdown in Japan to boost its stakes in a handful of stocks including UACJ Corp. and Sanken Electric Co.】

item.title: 白宫如何看待经济安全
item.description:
与副国安局局长达列普-辛格的对话

【原文：

A conversation with Deputy NSA Daleep Singh

】

item.title: 津巴布韦委托开展风能研究，帮助增加发电量
item.description: 作为增加发电量努力的一部分，津巴布韦已委托对这个南部非洲国家的风力发电潜力进行研究。【原文：Zimbabwe has commissioned a study of wind-power potential in the southern African nation as part of an effort to increase electricity generation.】

item.title: 埃克萨罗公司首席执行官称南非铁路拥堵状况已经见底
item.description: 据煤炭生产商埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）称，南非糟糕的铁路运输业绩削弱了矿商的出口能力，这种情况将得到改善。【原文：South Africa’s abysmal rail performance that’s crimped the ability of miners to export output is set to improve, according to coal producer Exxaro Resources Ltd.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气成本上升表明供应担忧持续存在
item.description: 欧洲 10 月份天然气合同的投保成本高于隆冬季节的合同，这表明交易商正在为供暖季开始时可能出现的供应中断做好准备。【原文：European natural gas contracts for October became more costly to insure than those for midwinter, signaling traders are bracing for possible supply disruptions at the start of the heating season.】

item.title: 令人失望的欧元区生产率使欧洲央行面临的挑战更加复杂
item.description: 欧元区第二季度的生产率几乎没有提高，再次低于欧洲中央银行的预期--这对其将通胀率恢复到 2% 的努力是一个打击。【原文：Euro-zone productivity barely improved in the second quarter and again missed the European Central Bank’s expectations – a blow for its efforts to bring inflation back to 2%.】

item.title: 非洲最大贷款机构标准银行称利润因工商银行而下滑
item.description: 非洲资产规模最大的贷款机构标准银行集团（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）称，上半年利润下降了 2%，因为其与中国最大贷款机构的合资企业的盈利几乎减少了一半。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd., Africa’s biggest lender by assets, said first-half profit fell 2% after earnings from its joint venture with China’s largest lender almost halved.】

item.title: 菲律宾消费低迷，中央银行下调政策利率
item.description: 菲律宾近四年来首次降息，并发出了更多降息信号，因为政策制定者希望保持经济增长势头。【原文：The Philippines cut interest rates for the first time in almost four years and signaled more to come, as policymakers look to preserve the momentum of economic growth.】

item.title: 印度需求强劲，林吉特疲软，棕榈油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于全球最大买家印度的需求强劲，加上马来西亚货币走软，使得这种热带油对海外买家更具吸引力，棕榈油连续第二天走高。【原文：Palm oil advanced for a second day thanks to strong demand from the world’s biggest buyer, India, and a weaker Malaysian currency, which made the tropical oil more attractive for overseas buyers.】

item.title: 英国经济保持稳健复苏，服务业助力增长
item.description: 英国从去年的经济衰退中保持了稳定的复苏步伐，这使首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在寻求促进经济增长和修复公共财政的过程中具备了坚实的经济基础。【原文：The UK maintained a steady pace of recovery from last year’s recession, putting Prime Minister Keir Starmer on a strong economic footing as he looks to boost growth and repair the public finances.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：指数将延续涨势至第五天
item.description: 2023年3月23日星期四，在英国圣阿坦的阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股有限公司（Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc）工厂的总装线上，一名员工在一辆阿斯顿-马丁DBX运动型多功能车（SUV）的引擎盖区域工作。在这家亏损的制造商表示将提高利润丰厚的车型（如190,000英镑（229,349美元）的DBX707运动型多用途车）的交付量之后，阿斯顿的业绩大幅飙升。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：An employee works in the bonnet area of an Aston Martin DBX sport utility vehicle (SUV) on the final assembly line at the Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc factory in St Athan, UK, on Thursday, March 23, 2023. Aston surged after the loss-making manufacturer said it’ll boost deliveries of lucrative models like the £190,000 ($229,349) DBX707 sport utility vehicle. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 病毒检测、医疗股因对 Mpox 的担忧而在全球大涨
item.description: 在世界卫生组织宣布非洲疫情为全球紧急卫生事件后，有助于抗击快速传播的麻风腮病毒株的疫苗和其他医疗产品制造商的股票上涨。【原文：Shares of vaccine and other medical product makers that can help combat a fast-spreading mpox virus strain advance, after the World Health Organization declared an outbreak in Africa a global health emergency.】

item.title: 随着开发商供应量增加，新加坡 7 月房屋销售回升
item.description: 新加坡 7 月份的新屋销售量上升到 3 月份以来的最高水平，从有记录以来最疲软的上半年恢复过来。【原文：Singapore’s new-home sales in July rose to the highest level since March, recovering from its weakest first half on record.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 通胀率低于 3%：是时候担心其他事情了
item.description:
数据平淡无奇，很可能关闭降息 50 个基点的大门。关注就业数据

【原文：

The numbers are bland and likely closing the door on a 50-basis-point cut. Keep an eye on jobs data

】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚货币下跌拉开了 Safaricom 盈亏平衡目标的距离
item.description: 东非市值最大的公司可能需要更长的时间才能在埃塞俄比亚实现收支平衡，因为这个非洲之角的国家五十年来首次允许其货币自由贸易，导致埃塞俄比亚货币暴跌。【原文：East Africa’s biggest company by market value may take longer to break even in Ethiopia after the Horn of Africa nation allowed its currency to trade freely for the first time in five decades, causing it to plunge.】

item.title: 缅甸军政府再次出售素季家族豪宅失败
item.description: 缅甸军政权未能出售被推翻的领导人昂山素季在该国商业首都的一处家族豪宅。【原文：The Myanmar military regime failed to sell a family mansion belonging to ousted leader Aung San Suu Kyi in the country’s commercial capital.】

item.title: 连锁便利店 99 Speed Mart 启动马来西亚七年来最大规模的上市活动
item.description: 马来西亚连锁便利店 99 Speed Mart Retail Holdings Bhd 已启动其价值 23.6 亿林吉特（约合 5.32 亿美元）的上市计划，这将是该国七年来最大规模的首次上市。【原文：Malaysian convenience-store chain 99 Speed Mart Retail Holdings Bhd has launched its 2.36 billion ringgit ($532 million) listing, in what would be the country’s biggest debut in seven years.】

item.title: 奔富酒庄扩建，豪华葡萄酒需求强劲
item.description: Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.表示，亚洲和美国市场对奢侈葡萄酒的需求强劲，奔富品牌的生产商在战略审查后表示将进一步重组业务。【原文：Treasury Wine Estates Ltd. flagged robust demand for luxury wine across Asia and the US, with the maker of the Penfolds brand signaling a further restructuring of its business after a strategic review.】

item.title: 岭南生态在市场压力下未能偿还可转换债券
item.description: 凌南生态文化旅游股份有限公司（LingNan Eco & Culture-Tourism Co.【原文：LingNan Eco & Culture-Tourism Co. said it failed to repay a convertible bond due Aug. 14, in the latest sign of stress in China’s $119 billion convertible debt market.】

item.title: 他信的忠实支持者成为总理候选人，各党派开始谈判
item.description: 泰国各政党将举行会谈，以便在周五举行议会会议推选新领导人之前，就由一位长期忠于他信-西那瓦的人士担任下一任总理达成共识。【原文：Thai political parties are set for talks to build consensus around a long-time Thaksin Shinawatra loyalist as the next prime minister ahead of a parliament meeting Friday to select a new leader.】

item.title: 中国削减钢铁产量，行业对需求敲响警钟
item.description: 中国钢铁生产商上个月削减了产量，因为糟糕的需求迫使这个利润率崩溃的行业大幅减产。【原文：Chinese steelmakers slashed output last month as woeful demand forced steep cuts on an industry contending with a collapse in margins.】

item.title: 铁矿石创 2022 年以来新低，钢厂危机引发市场震荡
item.description: 铁矿石创下自 2022 年以来的最低水平，原因是人们担心全球供应超过需求，中国的钢铁制造商正深陷危机，而主要矿商却在增加出口。【原文：Iron ore hit the lowest level since 2022 on concern that global supply is running ahead of demand, with China’s steelmakers mired in a crisis just as major miners boost exports.】

item.title: 中国房价下滑在政府救市努力后有所缓解
item.description: 中国的房价跌势在 7 月份有所缓解，这表明政府为重振市场所做的最有力的努力已初见成效。【原文：China’s home-price downturn abated in July, a sign that the government’s most forceful effort to revive the market is beginning to take hold.】

item.title: 分析师称泰国市场面临政治风险压力
item.description: 泰国总理下台后，泰国市场可能会继续承压，分析人士担心，原本可以提振投资者信心的政策可能会被推迟。【原文：Thailand’s markets are likely to remain under pressure following the ouster of the nation’s Prime Minister, with analysts citing worries over the potential delay of policies that would have boosted investor confidence.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利今年在日本创下新高，增长势头强劲
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在日本的收入创下历史新高，主要得益于股票和债券交易的增长，摩根士丹利承诺帮助促进日本的投资。【原文：Morgan Stanley posted record revenue in Japan driven by gains in share and bond trading as it pledged to help boost investment in the country.】

item.title: Klarna 接近选定高盛为美国 IPO 的牵头银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Klarna Bank AB 接近选择高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Klarna Bank AB is close to selecting Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to lead the financial technology firm’s US initial public offering next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 淡马锡在七月大跌前斥资数十亿美元购买美国科技股
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Singaporean state-owned investor Temasek Holdings Pte. spent billions of dollars in the second quarter buying shares in US technology giants, just before the sector dropped in July.】

item.title: 澳大利亚债券收益率创 13 个月新低，因押注澳大利亚央行将打破僵局
item.description: 由于越来越多的人猜测澳大利亚储备银行正逐步接近开始降息，澳大利亚的债券收益率跌至13个月来的最低点。【原文：Australia’s bond yields dropped to a 13-month low amid growing speculation that the nation’s Reserve Bank is inching closer to the start of interest-rate cuts.】
